owners.title: Owners
owners.description: Owners listed here will be allowed to give ship-its. These are referred to as 'owner source code ACLs'.

release_owners.title: Release Owners
release_owners.description: Owners listed here will be allowed to give ship-its. (same as owners, but can't be in the same file). These are referred to as 'release owner ACLs'.

paths.title: Paths
paths.description: List of globs that describe files this ACL defines the ownership of

exclude_paths.title: Exclude Paths
exclude_paths.description: Paths listed here will not require ship-its from ACL owners listed on this ACL file. Note that release_owners ACL restrictions still apply as with owner restrictions on other ACL files.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: These groups can be picked up by git-review and will be added to the review. This can be used to have group notifications of reviews.

whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Users listed here do not need to be given ship-its to commit. This should only be used for service accounts. Individual users should never be in the whitelist except in the case of Hackday or experimental Multiproducts (which should be marked as such)

block_message.title: Block Message
block_message.description: This will display a custom message when trying to access files that are locked.
